headline: EPAM Receives 2025 AWS Global Innovation Partner of the Year
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM) is excited to announce it is a recipient of a 2025 Geography and Global AWS Partner Award, recognizing leaders around the globe that are playing key roles in helping their customers drive innovation and build solutions on Amazon Web Services (AWS). EPAM has been named the winner of Innovation Partner of the Year – Global, recognizing organizations that deliver innovative consulting, professional, managed and value-added services. Winners have demonstrated proof in
